response.overview: BanG Dream! 7th☆LIVE, officially titled as TOKYO MX presents 「BanG Dream! 7th☆LIVE」, was a three-day concert event and the BanG Dream! franchise's seventh official live concert event. It was held on February 21-23, 2019.  The concert days were the following:  The first day was Roselia's fifth official solo live concert, "Hitze". The second day was "Genesis", RAISE A SUILEN's fourth official solo live concert, featuring guest appearances by Misawa Sachika, Maeshima Ami, Itou Miku, and Mimori Suzuko. The third day was Poppin'Party's seventh official solo live concert, "Jumpin' Music♪". The KIZUNA MUSIC♪, BRAVE JEWEL and R・I・O・T singles released on December 12, 2018 included priority ballot tickets for the event.  All three performances were released separately on Blu-ray on February 19, 2020, and were also made available together in a "COMPLETE BOX" set which featured a bonus fifty-two-page photo booklet.
response.title: BanG Dream! 7th☆LIVE
